mapper.select: select bid, bcname, btitle, mname, bviewcount, bcreate from board b join bcategory bc on b.bcid = bc.bcid join member m on b.mid=m.mid ORDER BY b.bid desc
select bc.bcid, bid, bcname, btitle, bcontent, mname, bviewcount, bcreate from board b join bcategory bc on b.bcid = bc.bcid join member m on b.mid=m.mid where bid=#{bid}
mapper.update: update board set bviewcount = bviewcount + 1 where bid=#{bid}
